GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v4.14.236
GSD.description:
net: caif: fix memory leak in caif_device_notify

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.236 by commit 4bca2034b41c15b62d47a19158bb76235fd4455d, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit 7c18d2205ea76eef9674e59e1ecae4f332a53e9e. For more details please see the references link.
